game_description: Play chess with your friends, with random people online or against the computer in a beautiful VR environment. The game supports many different platforms - VR, smart phones, tablets, smart TVs, so you can play with your friends even if they don't use a VR headset. There are also many online players that you can play with and the rating algorithm will make sure that you're matched with opponents of a similar strength, so you can always enjoy an interesting and competitive game. We hope you like it!
